casebody.data:
Audrey SAMPSON, Plaintiff,
v.
3M COMPANY, Defendant. M-675 September Term 2017
080316 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 9, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of the Association of Corporate Counsel for leave to appear as amicus curiae is granted limited to the filing with this court of the brief that accompanied the motion. Movant may seek further participation on the remand by motion to the Superior Court, Appellate Division.
